headline.main: Cops: Man 'Fooling Around' With Gun Kills Firefighter Friend
headline.print_headline: Cops: Man 'Fooling Around' With Gun Kills Firefighter Friend

docs.snippet: A man pleaded not guilty Wednesday to charges he fatally shot his firefighter friend while they were drinking alcohol and playing with a handgun....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man pleaded not guilty Wednesday to charges he fatally shot his firefighter friend while they were drinking alcohol and playing with a handgun.

headline.main: Tunisia Medic Killed in Turkey Blast Was Seeking Son in Islamic State: Sources
headline.print_headline: Tunisia Medic Killed in Turkey Blast Was Seeking Son in Islamic State: Sources

docs.snippet: A Tunisian military doctor seeking to retrieve his son who had joined Islamic State in Syria was among those killed in Tuesday's suicide attack by militants at Istanbul airport, a security sources said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Tunisian military doctor seeking to retrieve his son who had joined Islamic State in Syria was among those killed in Tuesday's suicide attack by militants at Istanbul airport, a security sources said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Brazil Official Says Political Crisis Won't Hit Rio Security
headline.print_headline: Brazil Official Says Political Crisis Won't Hit Rio Security

docs.snippet: One of Brazil's top security officials says the political turmoil that has brought repeated changes to key government positions will not affect security at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics....
docs.lead_paragraph: One of Brazil's top security officials says the political turmoil that has brought repeated changes to key government positions will not affect security at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics.

headline.main: Michigan Governor Signs Budget With $165M More for Flint
headline.print_headline: Michigan Governor Signs Budget With $165M More for Flint

docs.snippet: Michigan Gov. Rick Snyder signed a $38.6 billion budget bill Wednesday that will more than triple state spending on the water emergency in Flint....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michigan Gov. Rick Snyder signed a $38.6 billion budget bill Wednesday that will more than triple state spending on the water emergency in Flint.

headline.main: Firm Says It Returned Christie's Phone, Contradicting Him
headline.print_headline: Firm Says It Returned Christie's Phone, Contradicting Him

docs.snippet: The mystery over what happened to the cellphone New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie used during the aftermath of the George Washington Bridge lane-closing scandal appears to have added another chapter....
docs.lead_paragraph: The mystery over what happened to the cellphone New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie used during the aftermath of the George Washington Bridge lane-closing scandal appears to have added another chapter.

headline.main: U.S. Homeland Security Officials Monitoring Situation After Turkish Blast
headline.print_headline: U.S. Homeland Security Officials Monitoring Situation After Turkish Blast

docs.snippet: U.S. Department of Homeland Security officials are monitoring the situation after attacks at Turkey's main Istanbul airport and have been in touch with U.S. and international counterparts, a department spokeswoman said....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Department of Homeland Security officials are monitoring the situation after attacks at Turkey's main Istanbul airport and have been in touch with U.S. and international counterparts, a department spokeswoman said.

headline.main: Gay Men in Ivory Coast Attacked for Showing Support to Orlando Victims: Rights Group
headline.print_headline: Gay Men in Ivory Coast Attacked for Showing Support to Orlando Victims: Rights Group

docs.snippet: Six gay men in Ivory Coast were abused and forced to flee their homes after they were pictured signing a condolence book for victims of the recent attack on a gay nightclub in Florida, a rights group said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Six gay men in Ivory Coast were abused and forced to flee their homes after they were pictured signing a condolence book for victims of the recent attack on a gay nightclub in Florida, a rights group said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Phelps Takes Morning Off Ahead of Big Night at Trials
headline.print_headline: Phelps Takes Morning Off Ahead of Big Night at Trials

docs.snippet: Michael Phelps decided to skip the 100 meters freestyle heats at the U.S. Olympic trials but will be back in the spotlight later on Wednesday with a chance to clinch a spot at the Rio Olympics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps decided to skip the 100 meters freestyle heats at the U.S. Olympic trials but will be back in the spotlight later on Wednesday with a chance to clinch a spot at the Rio Olympics.
